snippet: Five finalists were named in each category — fiction, nonfiction, young people’s literature and poetry — and the winners will be announced Nov. 20.
abstract: Finalists for the National Book Awards are announced, one month before winners will be named; complete list of finalists noted.
lead_paragraph: Five finalists were named in each category — fiction, nonfiction, young people’s literature and poetry — and the winners will be announced Nov. 20.

headline.main: Finalists for National Book Awards Announced
headline.print_headline: Finalists Named for National Book Awards
